plot: Again the admired Mr. Dreamy parks in front of the Cafe. And again the shy waitress doesn't dare to go out and talk to him. But her friend has a crazy idea how she can get to know this guy.
title: Mit besten Grüßen
plot_es: Again the admired Mr. Dreamy parks in front of the Cafe. And again the shy waitress doesn't dare to go out and talk to him. But her friend has a crazy idea how she can get to know this guy.
plot_en: Again the admired Mr. Dreamy parks in front of the Cafe. And again the shy waitress doesn't dare to go out and talk to him. But her friend has a crazy idea how she can get to know this guy.
